caller_intent: Ellie wants to pay the remaining balance of her father Melvin Ody's homeowners insurance policy in full and confirm the amount and due date.
resolution_steps: Brandi confirms the policyholder's name (Melvin Ody) and verifies the account.
Brandi calculates the remaining balance for the year as $1,285.68.
Brandi informs Ellie the payment is due by October 11th.
Ellie agrees to pay the full amount and thanks Brandi.
knowledge_required: Ability to calculate remaining premium balances
Knowledge of payment deadlines and options
systems_referenced: Alliance Insurance Services policy management system
summary: Ellie contacts Brandi to pay the remaining balance of her father Melvin Ody's homeowners insurance policy. Brandi confirms the amount ($1,285.68) and due date (October 11th). Ellie decides to pay in full and appreciates the assistance.
